page.title: 06RECREATION
page.content: A survey of 58 children interviewed in St.Patrick's school showed football as the most popular boys game,and netball as the most popular girls game.Indoor games such as {Monopoly}are much loved by boys and girls alike. A popular street game is{Hide and go seek.}These are not the only games children play.There are outdoor games such as{Kick the can,Tag and various other games.Hobbies which are popular with children indoors are; colouring _ in, collecting stamps postcards, badges and other things they find interesting.Outdoor hobbies such as{Bird Watching,and {Train Spotting}are popular. Computers found favour with only eight per cent of the survey group.
